title: Kha'zix jungle - how do I know whether to kill the small minions first
body: if you know his jungle route that would be nice too.

replies.body:
Here is a good clear guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=16_HrQvjo20

This guy is really good at Kha'zix 

Here is a montage of him on the bug:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SRxwngdCS3Y

Kill the small ones first for buffs, Krugs and Raptors.

Less important for wolves, but still an option.

Kill small ones first.
They deal a lot of damage without having a lot of health, and by killing them off, you can get the main one Isolated.
As a rule, if a jungler does not have good aoe damage or high sustain, clear small monsters first - it decreases the damage you take greatly.
Early clear I think it's kill small first.  Then later just whatever.
I don't know {{champion:121}} but I imagine yes it's good to kill the small ones first because they're weak and you get bonus damage on the big one because it's isolated....
